Variant Image Dimensions
settings.info: Value should be [number]x[number], e.g. 400x400, and will be used as the ?F= querystring in the url. This will control the size of images populated in the variant swatches. This is applied as a parameter to the Pixel url provided in the metafield.

settings.label: Size sorting order
settings.info: List the options you would like to see first (each separated by a comma)

settings.default: Looks like something's not quite right, please check your card number and PIN.

settings.label: General error message
settings.default: Looks like something went wrong, please contact us to use your gift card.

settings.label: Enable Splash Page
settings.info: Do you want to always display a splash page on any page of the store?

settings.info: Type the handle of the exception pages you still want to show (separated with a comma eg. store-moorabbin,store-tempe)

settings.content: Bulky products are identified by the tag 'Shipping: Bulk'. Safety products are identified by the tag 'Returns: Safety'.

settings.label: Bulky + Safety
settings.default: Product can only be returned if proved faulty

settings.label: Not Bulky + Safety
settings.default: Product can only be returned if proved faulty

name: Minimum Price Threshold to Use Afterpay

settings.label: Threshold
settings.info: A dollar value that represents the minimum spend required to trigger the payment option.

settings.label: Cart Page Message
settings.info: The message to be shown when visiting the cart page if the threshold is not met for the cart total. This accept variables, [gateway] and [threshold]. E.G: "[gateway] is available on orders over [threshold]".

settings.label: Product Page Message
settings.info: The message to be shown when visiting the product page if the threshold is not met for the price of the individual product. This accept variables, [gateway] and [threshold]. E.G: "[gateway] is available on orders over [threshold]".

settings.label: Checkout Message
settings.info: The message to be shown during checkout if the threshold is not met for the cart total. This accept variables, [gateway] and [threshold]. E.G: "[gateway] is available on orders over [threshold]".

name: Minimum Price Threshold to Use Zip Pay

settings.label: Threshold
settings.info: A dollar value that represents the minimum spend required to trigger the payment option.

settings.label: Cart Page Message
settings.info: The message to be shown when visiting the cart page if the threshold is not met for the cart total. This accept variables, [gateway] and [threshold]. E.G: "[gateway] is available on orders over [threshold]".

settings.label: Product Page Message
settings.info: The message to be shown when visiting the product page if the threshold is not met for the price of the individual product. This accept variables, [gateway] and [threshold]. E.G: "[gateway] is available on orders over [threshold]".

settings.label: Checkout Message
settings.info: The message to be shown during checkout if the threshold is not met for the cart total. This accept variables, [gateway] and [threshold]. E.G: "[gateway] is available on orders over [threshold]".

settings.label: Min Price in $
settings.info: Products greater than or equal to this price will be shown as getting free shipping.

settings.label: Max Weight in grams
settings.info: Products lighter than this weight will be shown as getting free shipping.
